name: Predestination (itch) (aeonincarnate)
description:
For LD50: A semi-pretentious game about running right, inevitability, predestination, fate, and death, told in 2 parts.

Best played with a controller.

Controls:

Platforming segment:
D-Pad/Arrow Keys - Move
XBox A/Space/Z  Key - Jump/Double Jump
XBox X/X Key - Run

Bullet hell segment:
D-Pad/Arrow Keys - Move
XBox A/Space/Z  Key - Shoot

Tips:

  • You will turn red during the bullet hell segment when you are being grazed by a bullet.
  • Remember, you can double jump!
  • Once you reach the final screen, you cannot restart the game. This is by design.

Credits:

Made in Godot 3.4.4
Platforming physics engine by me
Bullet hell realized using bullethellper
Graphics by me using Aseprite, GIMP and Creature Mixer
Palette from lospec
Music by me using LSDJ
Sounds made with SFXr
Splat sound by anonymous
